channel.title: How to set a command limit for ::starter

item.title: How to set a command limit for ::starter
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Well I’m trying to limit the amount of times a player can use a code if they’re a regular player.
For Example (this probably isn’t even close just showing you)

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && playerRights >= 0) if(c.runej == 2 && playerRights == 0){ return false; } else { addItem(555, 2000); addItem(556, 2000); addItem(558, 2000); addItem(554, 2000); addItem(561, 2000); addItem(557, 2000); addItem(566, 2000); addItem(565, 2000); addItem(560, 2000); addItem(563, 2000); addItem(564, 2000); addItem(559, 2000); addItem(553, 2000); addItem(562, 2000); }

Read full topic
item.source: How to set a command limit for ::starter
